name: .CIV5SAVE
summary: Learn about .CIV5SAVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To resume the saved game a CIV5SAVE file contains, place the file in the correct sub-directory within Civilization V's Saves directory. In Windows, the Saves directory is located at:
Then, find and load the saved game your CIV5SAVE file contains in Civilization V (multiplatform).
You can also edit the data a CIV5SAVE file contains using the unoffical, online Civilization V Save Editor.
